document.full_text: the atlanta braves scored three runs in the 10th inning to complete a three-game sweep of the san francisco giants with a 9-6 victory on sunday.
document.title: braves sweep giants with 10th inning barrage
lines_and_colors: the atlanta braves scored three runs in the 10th inning to complete a three-game sweep of the san francisco giants with a 9-6 victory on sunday.
